content.question: A block attached to a spring is oscillating in simple harmonic motion between <math alttext="x equals positive A " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x equals negative A " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>âˆ’</mo><mi>A</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>. A graph of position <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> as a function of time <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> for the block is shown above. At which of the labeled times is negative work being done on the block by the spring?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
